duties_responsibilities.duty: Project management of small to medium-sized projects for building enclosure consulting and design
Supervision of team members and client relationships for major projects
Maintain professional relationships and involvement in field of technical expertise
Perform initial review of architectural drawings, shop drawings, and submittals
Assist with construction administration services and conduct factory inspections and site visits
Perform forensic investigations and documentation of existing conditions and assist with remediation design of building enclosures
Prepare professionally written technical reports and sketches using AutoCAD or hand-written techniques
Litigation support for projects involving technical issues

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Architecture, Engineering or Architectural Engineering, preferred (Master's preferred)
Professional registration or ability to obtain registration within one year, preferred
